readable.title: 3652764505_87139e71f8
readable.content: A blue building has smoke pouring out while a firetruck sits in front of it . A blue building on fire with black smoke pouring out with a firetruck on the scene . A large blue building has black smoke billowing out and a fire engine sits in front . A man runs as a firetruck arrives to a fire . A red truck is parked next to a burning blue building while a man in a green vest runs toward it .
